pull_request.title: feat(console): add strict relationship detection
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Adds strict relationship detection for cross-source intelligence graph. Includes Linear and Sentry-specific transformers that extract entity references and build typed edges between observations.

## Changes
- Added `relationship-graph.ts` with typed edge and node primitives
- Added `linear-relationship.ts` transformer for Linear issue/project references
- Added `sentry-relationship.ts` transformer for Sentry issue/event references
- Updated search index exports

## Testing
- [x] Unit tests for relationship graph construction
- [x] Linear transformer correctly extracts issue identifiers
- [x] Sentry transformer correctly links error events to issues

event.message: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'results')

data.body: Sentry flagged CONSOLE-291 in the preview deployment - TypeError in answer-runtime.ts executeAnswerQuery. The results object is undefined when the search index returns empty. Need to add null check before accessing .results property. Related to the workspace search refactor in PR #353.

issue.title: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'results')

pull_request.title: feat(console): search-answer-workspace-rework
pull_request.body:
## Summary
Complete rework of workspace search and new answer API with AI runtime.

## Changes
- **Answer API**: New tRPC endpoint with AI runtime, search tool, graph tool, and timeline tool
- **Dual Auth Middleware**: Extracted reusable auth middleware for both user and M2M contexts
- **Sonner Migration**: Replaced all useToast calls with Sonner toast
- **Search Decomposition**: Split monolithic search panel into modular components (input, results, filters)
- **Answer Interface**: New answer panel and streaming UI components
- **Lint/Type Fixes**: Resolved all build errors

## Testing
- [x] Answer API streams responses correctly
- [x] Search components render independently
- [x] Auth middleware works for both user and M2M contexts
- [x] Clean build with no lint or type errors

## Related
- Follows #352 (relationship detection)

data.title: Implement answer interface
data.description: Build the answer API endpoint and streaming UI components for the workspace. Includes AI runtime with search, graph, and timeline tools.

data.title: Workspace search refactor
data.description: Decompose the monolithic workspace search panel into modular components. Split into search input, results display, and filter components for better maintainability.

nodes.title: PR #352: feat(console): add strict relationship detection

data.body:
## Search & Answer Milestone Complete

All 5 tickets for the search-answer-workspace-rework shipped in a single development cycle (Feb 5-6):

1. **Relationship Graph** - Cross-source intelligence graph with typed edges and nodes
2. **Strict Relationship Detection** - Linear and Sentry-specific transformers for entity extraction
3. **Answer API** - New tRPC endpoint with AI runtime, search tool, graph tool, and timeline tool
4. **Workspace Search Refactor** - Decomposed monolithic search into modular components
5. **Sonner Migration** - Completed toast notification migration

PR #352 (relationship detection) and PR #353 (answer API + workspace rework) both merged to main. Production deployment successful.

Sprint 3 now at 90% completion with 2 tickets remaining.
